text: 24.2: Jer 26.18; Mai 3.12; Ru 19.44Mbe ana nzuaim, ana kha kamen mbe nzuai, “Nde kha phena vhuuaŋ muuŋgi bigi garire? Gu guigira nde nzuai, mbe ana kɨma the ganɨri, ana harigi ne tɨn ndarav kegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mbe za nta shogɨp, nta phɨrɨv, za nta fuv nɨɨaŋ suegɨrga.” 24.2 Khe mba meeŋthɨgi buna mpeeŋ Zisas ne bun suaŋgi. Mba kameŋ Matiu khergi gavar ki. Mba kameŋ Mat. 24.2 - 25.46. Mba buni nta Zisas taagi zirɨrga tuk han mbararga, hɨrga bigi ana nta bun nzuai.
